description: Pope Francis declared Mother Teresa to be a Roman Catholic saint, and visitors to Vatican City shared their admiration of her after the canonization.
title: Pilgrims Pay Tribute to St. Teresa
title_page: Pilgrims Pay Tribute to St. Teresa - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Pope Francis declared Mother Teresa to be a Roman Catholic saint, and visitors to Vatican City shared their admiration of her after the canonization.
